description: Three straight friends mistakenly book their spring break trip in a gay, clothing optional resort. Colby Jansen, a big hunky bear walks into the straight Bennett Anthony's room wearing nothing but a towel and starts coming onto him. He then drops the towel and the now naked Colby backs Bennett into a room and onto a bed. After a little convincing, Bennett is ready for some hot fun and A LOT of cum.
title: Bear Weekend Part 1
